C

card - Variable in class CardPlacement
Reference to the card that this instance of CardPlacement is linked to.
Card - Class in Unnamed Package
The Card class represents the simplest concept of card which all other types of cards extend.
It represents the fundamental unit of gameplay.
Card(Corner[]) - Constructor for class Card
Default Constructor
Creates the card with the array of corners provided.
CardGolden - Class in Unnamed Package
The CardGolden class extends the CardResource class by adding constraints to its playability and generally increasing the points awarded when played.
CardGolden(Corner[], Resource, int, Map<Resource, Integer>) - Constructor for class CardGolden
Constructor for CardGolden without point multipliers
CardGolden(Corner[], Resource, int, Map<Resource, Integer>, Item, boolean) - Constructor for class CardGolden
Constructor for CardGolden with point multiplier
cardGoldenVisible1 - Variable in class Game
First visible Golden Card.
cardGoldenVisible2 - Variable in class Game
Second visible Golden Card.
cardPattern - Variable in class ObjectiveGeometric
Map containing the required pattern to satisfy the objective.
The Keys of the map are the coordinates of the pattern and the Values are the Resource/Color of the pattern.
CardPlacement - Class in Unnamed Package
This class will store all the "positional" information of played cards.
When any card is played a new object of this class will be instanced and linked to it storing all the information about that card that is contextual to the current game.
The class stores the following information about the card it is linked to:
-Visibility of the corners (
CardPlacement(Card, Coordinates, boolean, boolean[]) - Constructor for class CardPlacement
Default Constructor.
Needs the card it's associated with, its coordinates object, its face orientation and an Array with the visibility of its corners.
CardResource - Class in Unnamed Package
The CardResource class is the most common implementation of the Card class in the game.
Resource Cards always have a resource and some of them can give points when placed.
CardResource(Corner[], Resource) - Constructor for class CardResource
Default Constructor.
Creates card with corners, resource but no points.
CardResource(Corner[], Resource, int) - Constructor for class CardResource
Card WITH points Constructor.
Creates card with corners, resource and points.
cardsHeld - Variable in class Player
ArrayList containing the cards being held by the player.
cardsLeft() - Method in class Deck
Method used to return the size (number of elements) currently in the ArrayList.
cardsPlaced - Variable in class Player
HashMap storing the information about the cards previously placed during the game by the player.
CardStarter - Class in Unnamed Package
 
CardStarter(Corner[], Map<Resource, Integer>) - Constructor for class CardStarter
Default Constructor, defines a Starter Card by its corners and the centralResources
centralResources - Variable in class CardStarter
Map containing the resources in the center of the card.
The Keys of the map are the Resources and the Values are number of units for a given resource.
color - Variable in class Player
String containing player's hex color code.
connectionStatus - Variable in class Player
A String containing the current connection status of the player to the server.
constraint - Variable in class CardGolden
Stores information about the playability constraint;
The key of the map is the resource, and the value is an integer indicating how many units of that resource are required.
containsKey(int, int) - Method in class DoubleHashMap
Checks if the position x,y contains a Card.
Returns true if position is NOT empty.
Returns false if position is empty.
coordinates - Variable in class CardPlacement
Coordinates of the card relative to the Starter Card [0,0].
Coordinates - Class in Unnamed Package
The Coordinates class is used to store information about card placement using an X and Y coordinate system.
Coordinates(int, int) - Constructor for class Coordinates
Default Constructor for Coordinates class.
coordX - Variable in class Coordinates
Stores the X coordinate.
coordY - Variable in class Coordinates
Stores the Y coordinate.
Corner - Class in Unnamed Package
The Corner class defines corners and all their intrinsic attributes, that is, the attributes that do not depend on how the player placed the card but rather describe what the corner contains and how it can be interacted with.
All corners are always linked to only one card.
Corner(CornerType) - Constructor for class Corner
Constructor for empty or null corners.
Corner(Item) - Constructor for class Corner
Constructor for item-holding corners.
Corner(Resource) - Constructor for class Corner
Constructor for resource-holding corners.
corners - Variable in class Card
Stores information about the type and contents of the card's corners.
corners[0] is the North-Western corner of the card and the remaining corners in the Array follow a clockwise pattern, specifically:
corners[0] = North-West
corners[1] = North-East
corners[2] = South-East
corners[3] = South-West
cornerType - Variable in class Corner
Describes the type of corner.
Allowed values are:
-EMPTY, the corner has no item or resource, but it CAN be covered by another card.
CornerType - Enum Class in Unnamed Package
Enum class that contains all allowed values for a corner.
corners reference this class when defining how they can be interacted with.
CornerType() - Constructor for enum class CornerType
 
cornerVisibility - Variable in class CardPlacement
Stores information about the visibility of each of the card's corners.
If true, the corner is visible, if false, the corner is covered and not visible.
cornerVisibility[0] is the North-Western corner of the card and the remaining corners in the Array follow a clockwise pattern, specifically:
cornerVisibility[0] = North-West
cornerVisibility[1] = North-East
cornerVisibility[2] = South-East
cornerVisibility[3] = South-West
